resources.string: Just A Concept Game, CC BY-NC, 2013

Heat the paper with a touch to reveal its hidden story. 
 Be careful though - too long a touch will scorch the paper and the message within. 
 Only after you uncover the whole message you will be allowed to continue with the story. 
 
 Sounds: 
 Night of Chaos, Kevin MacLeod 
 Burning-Room: suonho
